title: Registration
text:
How to Register

Step 1: Fill the registration form
Click the button below to access the registration form:  Registration Form


Step 2: Payment
After submitting the form, you will receive an email with payment instructions.
Payment methods accepted:

Bank transfer
Credit card (via PayPal)

Bank details:
Bank: [Bank Name]
Account holder: [Name]
IBAN: [IBAN number]
BIC/SWIFT: [Code]
Reference: CONF2025 - [Your Surname]


Step 3: Confirmation
Once payment is received, you will receive a confirmation email with your registration number.

title: Registration
text:
Cancellation Policy

Before May 1, 2025: Full refund minus ‚Ç¨50 administrative fee
May 1-31, 2025: 50% refund
After June 1, 2025: No refund

title: Venue & Accommodation
text:
Visa Information
Participants from outside the Schengen Area may require a visa. Please check requirements well in advance.
If you need an invitation letter for visa purposes, please contact us at email@conference.org after completing your registration.
